sk1.name: Gush
sk1.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 4 seconds.

sk2.name: Kraken Shell
sk2.desc: Creates a thick armor shell that reduces physical damage and removes negative buffs when damage received reaches a critical threshold.Kraken Shell does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

sk3.name: Anchor Smash
sk3.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

sk4.name: Ravage
sk4.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
